turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you grab me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store should i get it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 3rd avenue and 42nd street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok cool. What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an Americano, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot, or Iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Milk? Sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, please, no sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah if that's the Medium nowadays.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok i'll put an order in right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You have my account details right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, i'll put it on there. So just the Americano?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande, with whole milk, hot. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. It's ordered, ready for pickup at the 3rd ave store shortly, and the receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fantastic. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Enjoy your coffee!
